title: Nails
summary: Manicure, pedicure, SPA procedures, broken and peeling nail treatments, express services.

highlights.heading: Expert nail care
highlights.text: Our nail care professionals are certified experts that sincerely love their work and never stop learning.

highlights.heading: Certified premium materials
highlights.text: We never compromise on the quality of tools or materials, which makes our manicures flawless and long-lasting.

highlights.heading: Safety is a priority
highlights.text: All our instruments go through a multiple-stage hospital-grade sterilisation and disinfection process and we only use disposable files.

highlights.heading: Nails breaking or peeling off?
highlights.text: Our nail experts use modern proven ways to strengthen, restore, treat and align your nails. We can work even with the most difficult cases.

highlights.heading: In a hurry?
highlights.text: Our staff will provide you with a “four-hands” or express manicure service: a perfect result twice as fast!
